title: Cooksy
description: Developed a responsive platform allowing users to buy and sell services like cooking and beauty, with personalized listings and customer reviews. Integrated Google login, Stripe payments, and a real-time chat feature, ensuring full responsiveness with Material UI and CSS.

title: ReplenishMD
description: Built a unified platform for inventory tracking, low stock alerts, doctor appointment and order management.Designed responsive doctor appointment scheduling with availability and notifications.Ensured secure data handling for inventory and patient records.

title: My Voyages
description: Built a web platform for travelers to share journeys and experiences, with profile creation, media posts, and trip details. Developed a responsive, interactive UI using React.js, fostering a community-driven experience for content sharing and connection.

title: FitTrack
description: Developed FitTrack, a personal fitness tracking application that allows users to log workouts, track progress, and set fitness goals.Implemented features such as workout logging, and goal-setting. Integrated third-party APIs to fetch data on exercise routines, nutritional information, and workout tips.
